create_flow_fee.description: The fee that must be paid to create a flow.

fee_collector_addr.description: The address of the fee collector to send flow creation fees to.

incentive_contract_id.description: The code ID of the incentive contract.

max_concurrent_flows.description: The maximum amount of flows that can exist for a single LP token at a single time.

max_flow_start_time_buffer.description:
The maximum start time buffer for a new flow (in seconds).

New flows are allowed to start up to `now + start_time_buffer` into the future.

max_unbonding_duration.description: The maximum amount of seconds that a user must bond their tokens for.

min_unbonding_duration.description: The minimum amount of seconds that a user must bond their tokens for.

AssetInfo.description: AssetInfo contract_addr is usually passed from the cw20 hook so we can trust the contract_addr is properly validated.
